topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: VooDoo cIRCle

screenshots.caption: Bot running in Windows(TM) console window

short_description: VooDoo cIRCle is modular IRC bot, scriptable thanks to PHP and Perl, with built-in SSL support, File System, private BotNet and advanced security rights for each user. Runs on POSIX/Unices, Windows and Mac OS X.
